A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I am not a  die hard Star Wars fan but I strongly believe this is the worst film in the franchise.  It completely lacked substantial character development and was riddled with amateurish plot holes.  This was a weakly directed movie with incredibly poor writing and an inconsistent tone.  I can't imagine this movie being anything other than a box office bomb if it hadn't been associated with the Star Wars brand.  This movie was a huge disappointment.
